-- | The error codes of the Plutus compiler & runtime
--   
--   Contains the documentation and helper code of all the errors and their
--   error-codes which can be thrown by the Plutus framework: compiler,
--   interpreter, and client code
@package plutus-errors
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | All the Plutus errors project-wide, indexed by their error code.
